<<<<<<< HEAD
Papa confutatus Sanctæ & apostolicæ Ecclesiae in confutationem Papæ. Actio prima. Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
[2], 113 [i.e. 117], [1] leaves
In ædibus Thomæ Dawson, impensis Richardi Sergier, Londini : 1580.
By John Foxe. "Actio secunda" begins on leaf 45. Leaf 116 misnumbered 113. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

In ædibus Thomæ Dawson, impensis Richardi Sergier, Londini : 1580.
By John Foxe. "Actio secunda" begins on leaf 45. Leaf 116 misnumbered 113. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Richardi Sergier
